ChangeList.Description: Added the **workloads** relationship to the [informationProtection](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/informationProtection?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **contentFormats** property to the [parentLabelDetails](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/parentLabelDetails?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **contentFormats** property to the [informationProtectionLabel](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/informationProtectionLabel?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **contentFormat** property to the [contentInfo](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/contentInfo?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the [encryptBuffer](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/informationProtection-encryptBuffer?view=graph-rest-beta) method to the [informationProtection](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/informationProtection?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the [decryptBuffer](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/informationProtection-decryptBuffer?view=graph-rest-beta) method to the [informationProtection](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/informationProtection?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.

Added the [checkConsent](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/informationProtectionPolicy-checkConsent?view=graph-rest-beta) method to the [informationProtectionPolicy](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/informationProtectionPolicy?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
